job_details.degree_required: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or a related field

primary: Certifications in AWS, GCP, or Azure database management
all: Certifications in AWS, GCP, or Azure database management

jd: From: Roshan singh yadav, Tek Inspirations roshan.yadav@tekinspirations.com Reply to: roshan.yadav@tekinspirations.com Hi,Hope you are doing well.Have a look at role. Let me know your view. Job Description - Client : Optum Job Title: Senior Database Administrator Location: Remote 100% Contract: 12 Months ***LinkedIn Is Required For this Role*** Project description We are seeking a skilled Database Administrator to join our cloud migration initiative focused on modernizing applications across multiple cloud platforms, including AWS, Google Cloud Platform (GCP), and Microsoft Azure. The ideal candidate will play a critical role in ensuring the seamless migration, optimization, and management of databases as part of our modernization strategy. Responsibilities The ideal candidate will play a critical role in ensuring the seamless migration, optimization, and management of databases as part of our modernization strategy. Skills -Must have Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or a related field.Proven experience as a Database Administrator with cloud platforms (AWS, GCP, Azure).Strong knowledge of database management, optimization, and administration on cloud environments.Experience with cloud-native database solutions and services.Familiarity with migration tools and techniques for cloud environments.Excellent problem-solving skills and attention to detail.Strong communication skills, with the ability to work effectively in a team setting.Certifications in AWS, GCP, or Azure database management.Experience in a multi-cloud environment.Understanding of application modernization practices and principles. Regards, Roshan Singh YadavTechnical RecruiterTEK Inspirations LLC | 13573 Tabasco Cat Trail, Frisco, TX 75035.Email: - roshan.yadav@tekinspirations.com
